original_definition: 'Environmental performance' means the results of the manufacturer’s management of the environmental aspects of the product, as reflected in its technical documentation file;
generated_definition: 'Environmental performance' means the ability of an organization or entity to minimize its negative impact on the environment, as measured by its consumption of natural resources, emissions, and waste.

Article 2: ‘Environmental performance’ of a product means the results of the manufacturer’s management of the environmental aspects of the product, as reflected in its technical documentation file;
